string.name: welcome
string.translation_description: Text shown instead of the user's name when the user is not signed in.

string.name: a11y_signed_in_content_description
string.translation_description: Description of the account header when the user is signed in.

string.name: a11y_signed_out_content_description
string.translation_description: Description of the account header when the user is not signed in.

string.name: dialog_sign_in_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. When the user needs to sign in.

resources.string: Sign in to save events, reserve seats and rate sessions (if an attendee). Actions will be synced from your account across app and site.

string.name: sign_in
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign in.

string.name: firebase_auth_no_network_connection
string.translation_description: Snackbar message when there is no network connectivity.

string.name: firebase_auth_unknown_error
string.translation_description: Snackbar message when Firebase Auth has an unknown error.

string.name: dialog_sign_out_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. Used to confirm that the user wants to sign out.

resources.string: All saved events, seat reservations and session ratings (if an attendee) remain synced to your account.

string.name: sign_out
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign out.

string.name: manage_google_account
string.translation_description: Text for a button allowing the user to manage their Google account.
